raw_title: PIERIS – In loving memorial of MICHAEL (SLBC/​ITN)
raw_body: PIERIS – In loving memorial of MICHAEL (SLBC/​ITN). Dearly beloved husband of late Joyce,​ loving father of mark (Sri Lanka),​ Bernadette & Assunthi (from Australia),​ father-in-law of Jenniffer (Bahrain),​ Russel Ekanayake (Australia),​ Christopher Bocks (Australia),​ adored grandfather of Myran & Sabrina,​ Natalie & Chris,​ Dimitri & Janelle,​ Chain & Seles,​ Yannitk & Milano (Australia),​ great grandfather of Jaylon,​ Cruz,​ Jai & Mila,​ expired. Funeral Mass will be on Thursday 13th July 2023 at 2.00 p.m. at St. Mary’s Church,​ Dandenong,​ Melbourne & afterwards Cremation at Springvale Cemetery,​ Melbourne.042536
